trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle" /> objects in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Reprezentuje kolekcję <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle" /> obiekty w <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> formantu.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> contains <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects that allows the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> control to display a customized grid style for each <xref:System.Data.DataTable> in a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> Zawiera <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> obiektów, które umożliwia <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> formantu, aby wyświetlić stylu siatki dostosowanego dla poszczególnych <xref:System.Data.DataTable> w <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.

trans-unit.source: On the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A> property returns the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>.
By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> does not contain any <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects.
Instead, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> displays each table using default settings for color, width, and formatting.
trans-unit.target: Zamiast tego <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> Wyświetla każdej tabeli kolor, szerokość i formatowanie przy użyciu ustawień domyślnych.

trans-unit.source: All columns of each table are displayed.
trans-unit.target: Wyświetlane są wszystkie kolumny w każdej tabeli.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> is added to the collection, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> to determine which object supplies the data for the grid.
trans-unit.target: Gdy <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> zostanie dodany do kolekcji, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> używa <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> ustalenie obiektu, który dostarcza dane w siatce.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the data source is a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> that contains three <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> must match the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> of one of the objects.
trans-unit.target: Na przykład, jeśli źródło danych jest <xref:System.Data.DataSet> zawiera trzy <xref:System.Data.DataTable> obiektów, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> musi odpowiadać <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> z jednego z tych obiektów.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> does not match any of the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> values, the default settings will be used to display data for each table, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> settings will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: Jeśli <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> nie pasuje do żadnego z <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> wartości, domyślne ustawienia będą stosowane do wyświetlania danych dla każdej tabeli i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> ustawienia zostaną zignorowane.

trans-unit.source: Always create <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects and add them to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> before adding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Zawsze twórz <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> obiekty i dodaj je do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> przed dodaniem <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> obiekty do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>.

trans-unit.source: When you add an empty <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> with a valid <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> value to the collection, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects are automatically generated for you.
trans-unit.target: Po dodaniu pustą <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> z prawidłowym <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> wartości do kolekcji, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> obiekty są generowane automatycznie.

trans-unit.source: Consequently, an exception will be thrown if you try to add new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects with duplicate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> values to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: W związku z tym, zostanie wygenerowany wyjątek przy próbie dodania nowych <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> obiektów ze zduplikowaną <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> wartości do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, clear the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Innym rozwiązaniem jest wyczyszczenie <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> przy użyciu <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Clear%2A> metody.

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects and adds each to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Poniższy przykład kodu tworzy dwa <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> obiekty i dodaje do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> zwrócony przez <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A> właściwość <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> formantu.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle" /> to add to the collection.
Adds a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle" /> to this collection.
The index of the newly added object.
The following code example creates two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects.
trans-unit.target: Poniższy przykład kodu tworzy dwa <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> obiektów.

trans-unit.source: The example then creates several <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects and adds them to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Następnie tworzony kilka <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> obiekty i dodaje je do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.

trans-unit.source: Finally, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Na koniec <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> obiekty są dodawane do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> przy użyciu <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Add%2A> metody.

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle" /> objects.
Adds an array of table styles to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Dodaje tablicy stylów tabeli do kolekcji.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: Poniższy przykład kodu pokazuje użycie tego elementu członkowskiego.

trans-unit.source: Clears the collection.
The following code example clears the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> before adding a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>.
trans-unit.target: Poniższy kod przykładowy czyści <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> przed dodaniem nowego <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the collection has changed.
For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Aby uzyskać więcej informacji na temat obsługi zdarzeń, zobacz [Obsługa i wywoływanie zdarzeń](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventHandler> delegate to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Poniższy przykładowy kod dodaje <xref:System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventHandler> przekazać <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.CollectionChanged> zdarzeń.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection" /> contains the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle" />.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera wartość wskazującą czy <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection" /> zawiera określony <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle" /> to look for.
Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection" /> contains the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle" /> specified by name.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera wartość wskazującą czy <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection" /> zawiera <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle" /> określona na podstawie nazwy.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified table style exists in the collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Jeśli określona tabela styl istnieje w kolekcji; w przeciwnym razie <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Contains%2A> method to determine if a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> with the specified <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> exists in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Poniższy przykład kodu wykorzystuje <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Contains%2A> metodę, aby określić, czy <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> z określonym <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> istnieje w kolekcji.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle" /> to look for.
Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection" /> contains the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle" />.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera wartość wskazującą czy <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection" /> zawiera określony <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified table style exists in the collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Jeśli określona tabela styl istnieje w kolekcji; w przeciwnym razie <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle" />.
The index of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle" /> to get.
Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle" /> specified by index.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle" /> at the specified index.
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Add%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.AddRange%2A> method to add items to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Użyj <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Add%2A> lub <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.AddRange%2A> metody do dodawania elementów do kolekcji.

trans-unit.source: The following code example returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> by passing an index to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Item%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Poniższy kod przykładowy zwraca <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> z <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> przez przekazanie indeks <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Item%2A> właściwości.

trans-unit.source: No item exists at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Nie istnieje żaden element w określonym indeksie.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle" /> to retrieve.
Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle" /> with the specified name.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle" /> with the specified <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName" />.

When retrieving a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Item%2A> property uses a case-insensitive comparison.
trans-unit.target: Podczas pobierania <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> przez <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Item%2A> właściwość używa porównania bez uwzględniania wielkości liter.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Add%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.AddRange%2A> method to add items to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Użyj <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Add%2A> lub <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.AddRange%2A> metody do dodawania elementów do kolekcji.

trans-unit.source: The following code example returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> by passing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Item%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Poniższy kod przykładowy zwraca <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> z <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> przez przekazanie <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Item%2A> właściwości.

trans-unit.source: Gets the underlying list.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> that contains the table data.
A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs" /> containing the event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.CollectionChanged" /> event.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle" /> to remove.
Removes the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle" />.

Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Contains%2A> method to determine if a specific <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> exists before using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Remove%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Użyj <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Contains%2A> metodę, aby określić, czy określony <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> istnieje przed użyciem <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Remove%2A> metody.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle" /> to remove.
Removes a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle" /> at the specified index.

Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Contains%2A> method to determine if a specific <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> exists before using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Remove%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Użyj <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Contains%2A> metodę, aby określić, czy określony <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> istnieje przed użyciem <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Remove%2A> metody.

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that is the destination of the elements copied from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Jednowymiarowa <see cref="T:System.Array" /> który jest miejscem docelowym elementów kopiowanych z kolekcji.

trans-unit.source: The array must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: Tablica musi mieć indeksowane zaczynające od zera.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in the array at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: Rozpoczyna się od zera indeks w tablicy, od których kopiowanie.

trans-unit.source: Copies the collection to a compatible one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" />, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: Kopiuje kolekcję do jednowymiarowego zgodnego <see cref="T:System.Array" />, rozpoczynając od określonego indeksu tablicy docelowej.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is null.
<paramref name="index" /> is less than zero.
<paramref name="array" /> is multidimensional.
-or-
The number of elements in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection" /> is greater than the available space from index to the end of the destination array.
trans-unit.target: Liczba elementów w <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection" /> jest większa niż dostępne miejsce od indeksu do końca tablicy docelowej.

trans-unit.source: The type in the collection cannot be cast automatically to the type of the destination array.
trans-unit.target: Typ w kolekcji nie można automatycznie rzutować na typ tablicy docelowej.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of items in the collection.
The number of items contained in the collection.
Gets a value indicating whether access to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection" /> is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: Pobiera wartość wskazującą czy uzyskują dostęp do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection" /> jest synchronizowane (wielowątkowość).

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera obiekt, który może służyć do synchronizujący dostęp do kolekcji.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" /> Używane do synchronizowania dostępu do kolekcji.

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator for the collection.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> for the collection.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle" /> to add to the collection.
Adds a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle" /> to this collection.
The index of the newly added object.
<paramref name="value" /> cannot be cast to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle" />.
<paramref name="value" /> has already been assigned to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection" />.
-or-

A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle" /> in <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection" /> has the same <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName" /> property value as <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle" /> w <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection" /> ma taką samą <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName" /> wartości właściwości jako <paramref name="value" />.

trans-unit.source: Clears the collection.
The object to locate in the collection.
The value can be <see langword="null" />.
Determines whether an element is in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Określa, czy element znajduje się w kolekcji.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if value is found in the collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Jeśli wartość zostanie znaleziona w kolekcji; w przeciwnym razie <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The object to locate in the collection.
The value can be <see langword="null" />.
Returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence of the specified object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Zwraca liczony od zera indeks pierwszego wystąpienia określonego obiektu w kolekcji.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first occurrence of value within the entire collection, if found; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: Liczony od zera indeks pierwszego wystąpienia wartości w ramach całą kolekcję, jeśli znaleziono; w przeciwnym razie wartość -1.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which value should be inserted.
trans-unit.target: Liczony od zera indeks, pod którym powinny zostać wstawione wartości.

trans-unit.source: The object to insert into the collection.
Implements the <see cref="M:System.Collections.IList.Insert(System.Int32,System.Object)" /> method.
Always throws <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" />.
You cannot insert an item into the middle of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Nie można wstawić elementu do środka kolekcji.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Add%2A> method to add a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Użyj <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Add%2A> metody w celu dodania <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> do kolekcji.

trans-unit.source: Always thrown.
Gets a value indicating whether the collection has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera wartość wskazującą, czy kolekcja ma stały rozmiar.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
Gets a value indicating whether the collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera wartość wskazującą, czy kolekcja jest tylko do odczytu.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
The zero-based index of the element.
Gets or sets the element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Pobieranie lub konfigurowanie elementów pod określonym indeksem.

trans-unit.source: The element at the specified index.
The item property cannot be set.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle" /> to remove from the collection.
Removes the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle" />.
<paramref name="value" /> cannot be cast to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle" />.
The zero-based index of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle" /> to remove.
trans-unit.target: Liczony od zera indeks <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle" /> do usunięcia.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> with the specified index from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Usuwa <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> z określonym indeksem z kolekcji.
